title: This New System Sucks
body: Nobody asked for this. It sounds cool, but its a bad idea. The matchmaking is unfair, I've been in gold and plat, go placed in bronze 4 after 1 win, then i went 6-2 in my placements. Now I have to deal with shitty silvers,bronzes, and golds because your matchmaking sucks. You said you'd revert it if it didn't work, its already 3 days in and nobody likes it, so revert it.
